thread.title: Queen's guard pulls rifle on tourist
thread.title_full: Queen's guard pulls rifle on tourist

author: Megan Ellis
title: Queen's guard pulls rifle on tourist
text:
Queen's guard pulls rifle on tourist Article By: Megan Ellis Tue, 30 Jun 2015 5:06 PM Share A Queen's Guard drill sergeant. Credit: flickr.com/ UK Ministry of Defence 
Members of the Queen's Guard are known for remaining stoic despite tourist shenanigans - but this tourist found himself looking down the barrel of a guard's rifle for his antics. 
A video of the tourist and the guard's interaction has gone viral - amassing almost 8.9 million views since June 22. 
The video shows a guard marching, as a tourist attempts to imitate him. 
As per usual, the guard ignores the tourist - right up until the tourist touches the guard's shoulder - the same shoulder which his rifle is leaning against. 
The guard then grabs his rifle, points it at the tourist (who darts away quicker than you can say "my bad") and shouts: "Get back from the Queen's Guard!" 
Note to self - never touch a guard's gun. 
Watch the entertaining video below: Related Articles
